simplenlg.test
Class SimpleNLG4Test

java.lang.Object
  junit.framework.Assert
      junit.framework.TestCase
          simplenlg.test.SimpleNLG4Test
All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdjectivePhraseTest, ClauseAggregationTest, ClauseTest, ExternalTest, FPTest, InterrogativeTest, NounPhraseTest, PhraseSpecTest, PrepositionalPhraseTest, TextSpecTest, VerbPhraseTest
public abstract class SimpleNLG4Test
extends junit.framework.TestCase

This class is the base class for all JUnit simplenlg.test cases for simplenlg. It sets up a a JUnit fixture, i.e. the basic objects (basic constituents) that all other tests can use.
